post.text: "My son was Captain Humayun Khan. He was 27 years old and he was a Muslim American. I want to ask Mr. Trump: Would my son have a place in your America?"

comment.author: James
comment.text: The very fact that this one horrendous issue with dumpy doesn't change his supporters makes them NOT AMERICAN PATRIOTS, IT MAKES THEM HYPOCRITICAL MONSTERS.

replies.author: Osgoode
replies.text: Mrs. Clinton's policies have turned the ME and N. Africa into killing fields, tens of thousands dead [probably in the millions by now]. She has armed and financed rebels and terrorists and terrorist countries. She's had her fingers in at least a couple of regime changes of sovereign gov'ts [Libya, Egypt and Honduras]. She's sold uranium to the Russians. She's made so many really bad decisions, she's lied about important and stupid stuff...and, she's a war monger. No thank you.

replies.author: James
replies.text: Osgoode - blah blah blah blah... You don't like the WARS THAT GW BUSH AND CHENEY STARTED. Don't blame it on Hillary or "her policies". Go back and remember the facts of these wars and the history. You dumpy TROLL.

replies.author: James
replies.text: Osgoode - the fact that you are ignoring the Khan family and their SONS DEATH AS A SOLDIER, to blame it on Hillary who inherited this war, that dumpy wants to change history because it makes him happy and you support him, MAKES YOU INCREDIBLY STUPID and a member of the basket of deplorables.

replies.author: James
replies.text: Osgoode - I hope you don't have a child that dies in the military only to have a reality tv show actor want to be commander in chief and then have Americans support the big lying mouth.
